articles.title: The Switch 2 is still on sale at multiple retailers if you missed out during Cyber Monday - The Verge
articles.description: The Switch 2 is still relatively new, so deals are rare. However, you can still get Nintendo’s latest console with a free copy of Mario Kart World for a limited time.

articles.title: Android’s new ‘Call Reason’ flags important calls before you even pick up - The Verge
articles.description: Android’s Call Reason feature will allow you to flag calls as “urgent” on the receiving person’s incoming call screen and in their call history.

articles.title: Epic Games Store decides "at the last minute" not to distribute Horses - GamesIndustry.biz
articles.description: Epic Games Store is the latest online storefront to withdraw support for the provocative indie game, Horses.

articles.title: The 15 Best Gaming Deals Still Live After Black Friday and Cyber Monday - IGN
articles.description: Here's the best gaming deals you can still pick after the Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales weekend concluded, including discounts on Switch 2 consoles, Xbox Game Pass, PS5 games, and more.
